Our mission

Trauma-Informed Training Institute is committed to expanding the professional growth of mental health service providers by developing and delivering continuing education programs and products of the highest quality.

Gale Kelley

Gale Kelley is a Doctor of Education, in Counseling Psychology; Licensed Mental Health Counselor in the state of Florida; National Board Certified Counselor; Certified Expert Trauma Professional; Qualified Supervisor for Mental Health Counseling and Marriage and Family Therapy; Approved Clinical Supervisor; Approved Expert Witness in the Sarasota County Twelfth Judicial Circuit Court of Florida; Approved Expert Witness in the Manatee County Twelfth Judicial Circuit Court of Florida; and Approved Expert Witness in the State of Ohio, Erie County, Common Pleas Court. Gale develops and teaches trauma-related continuing education courses throughout the United States and internationally. She is the former Clinical Director of the Child Protection Center in Sarasota, FL, and founder of Trauma Treatment & Mental Health Services and Trauma-Informed Training Institute.
